flavor: "Time to try this untested bit of business..."
name: Ironheart
text: Level Up! — Action: Remove 6 progress counters from Ironheart → ready her and swap her with [[Version 2]] Ironheart.

name: Riri Williams
text: Begin the game with this card. Set your other identities aside. (See insert.) Child Prodigy — Action: Spend a [mental] resource → place 1 progress counter on Riri Williams. (Limit once per round.)

name: Ironheart
text: Level Up! — Action: Remove 6 progress counters from Ironheart → ready her, give her a tough status card, and swap her with [[Version 3]] Ironheart.

flavor: "Just let me finish this up, then I'll eat and frolic and do whatever."
name: Riri Williams
text: Child Prodigy — Action: Spend a [mental] resource or 2 resources of any type → place 1 progress counter on Riri Williams. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Oh, you wanna play, villain person? Let's play."
name: Ironheart
text: Maximum Efficiency — Hero Action: Remove 1 progress counter from Ironheart → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I can build something lighter, faster, stronger."
name: Riri Williams
text: Child Prodigy — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → place 1 progress counter on Riri Williams. (Limit once per round.)

name: Brawn
text: While Brawn is exhausted, he gains: "Resource: Generate a [mental] resource. (Limit once per phase.)"

name: Fly Over
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme and place 1 progress counter on Ironheart (2 progress counters instead if this thwart removes the last threat from that scheme).

name: Photon Beam
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy and place 1 progress counter on Ironheart (2 progress counters instead if this attack defeats that enemy).

name: New and Improved
text: Hero Action: Choose X different options, where X is equal to Ironheart's [[version]] number: • Search your deck for an Ironheart card and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.) • Give Ironheart a tough status card. • Ready Ironheart.

name: Sector Scan
text: Reduce the cost to play Sector Scan by X, where X is equal to Ironheart's [[version]] number. Hero Action: Until the end of the round, you may look at the top card of the encounter deck at any time.

name: Stroke of Genius
text: Response: After you spend this card, place 1 progress counter on your identity and draw 1 card.

name: Ronnie Williams
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Ronnie Williams → choose: • Heal 2 damage from Riri Williams. • Place 1 progress counter on Riri Williams.

flavor: "I downloaded my fabulous self into a digital frame in case my body was ever... you know, not working anymore."
name: Tony Stark A.I.
text: Action: Exhaust Tony Stark A.I. → look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the other.

name: Photon Blasters
text: You get +2 hit points. Hero Action: Exhaust Photon Blasters → deal damage to an enemy equal to Ironheart's [[Version]] number.

name: Propulsion Jets
text: You get +2 hit points. Hero Action: Exhaust Propulsion Jets → remove threat from a scheme equal to Ironheart's [[Version]] number.

name: Cloud 9
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Cloud 9 → choose a player. Until the end of the phase, each [[Aerial]] character that player controls gets +1 THW.

flavor: "Hey, uh, it's Joaquín. I'm here to rescue you. And, uh, good thing, right?"
name: Falcon
text: Hero Response: After Falcon attacks or thwarts, spend a [energy] resource → ready another [[champion]] character you control.

flavor: "I'm surrounded by those who risk their lives for principles most people take for granted."
name: Patriot
text: Hero Response: After Patriot enters play, choose a [[champion]] character → that character gets +1 to each of its basic powers until the end of the round.

name: Go All Out
text: Requirement ([energy]). (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Hero Action (attack): Exhaust your hero → deal damage to an enemy equal to the total of your hero's THW, ATK, and DEF values.

name: Push Ahead
text: Requirement ([mental]). (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust your hero → remove threat from a scheme equal to the total of your hero's THW, ATK, and DEF values.

name: R&D Facility
text: Requirement ([mental][mental]). Uses (3 research counters). Hero Action: Exhaust R&D Facility and remove 1 research counter from it → choose a friendly character in play. That character gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Snowguard
text: Response: After Snowguard enters play, place up to 3 shift counters here. While the shift counters here are equal to (X), she gets: (1) +3 ATK and her attacks gain overkill. (2) +3 THW and gains the [[Aerial]] trait. (3) +5 hit points and gains retaliate 1.

name: Vivian
text: Hero Response: After Vivian enters play, choose an attachment, non-[[Elite]] minion, or non-permanent side scheme. Until the end of the round, treat that card's printed text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]).

name: "Go for Champions!"
text: Max 1 per deck. Play only if your identity has the [[champion]] trait. Hero Action: Each [[champion]] character in play cannot take damage until the end of the round.

name: Ingenuity
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Genius]] trait. Max 1 per player. Resource: Exhaust Ingenuity → generate a [mental] resource.

name: Bombshell
text:
[star] Divide damage from Bombshell's attack among each enemy as evenly as possible.
 Play only if your identity has the [[champion]] trait.

name: Wasp
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[champion]] trait.
Wasp ignores the guard keyword, patrol keyword, and crisis icon ([crisis]).

name: Pinpoint
text: Play only if your identity has the [[champion]] trait. Hero Interrupt: When a player card would be placed into a discard pile from play, exhaust Pinpoint → shuffle that card into its owner's deck instead.
